content:
As an AI language model, I don't have the capability to listen to music or keep up with recent releases in real-time. However, I can tell you that Lil Wayne has continued to release music in recent years, including his latest album "Funeral," which was released in January 2020. 

Lil Wayne is known for his creative lyricism and has explored various styles and sounds throughout his career. Judging from his body of work over the years, it's likely that he is continuing to push himself creatively and experiment with new sounds and approaches in his music.
